items.title: About Flame Rewards
What is Flame Rewards?
items.subtitle: Flame Rewards is Oporto’s loyalty program, recognising regular customers and giving them access to instant rewards and special offers. Members earn loyalty credit, or Flame Rewards dollars, on every qualifying transaction to spend at participating Oporto restaurants – these savings are just the beginning!
